title: Semantic Search MCP Server
description: Create a Python MCP server that provides semantic search capabilities for feature-management directories using ChromaDB with local ONNX embeddings. The server manages per-project ChromaDB collections, indexes titles/descriptions/PROMPT.md content, and provides search, duplicate detection, and similarity tools. Uses on-demand indexing with staleness checking.
user_impact: Enables semantic search across work items to find related bugs/features, detect duplicates before creation, and surface relevant context when working on items
